item.title: Basic waveforms used in the control systems and its implimentation technique
item.description: The control theory uses the following waveforms. Step Square Rectangular Sine Triangular Sawtooth Programmers working in the control theory applications may require to generate these waveforms. There are several techniques to produce these waveforms. This post presents an easy way of creating these waveforms. Also, an interactive way of testing these waveforms is available. Note that the functions presented here are easy to implement but not always efficient.
